channel.title: Map Loading
channel.description:
So I am not sure if this has been discussed before but... if you goto /spawn
and watch the world map load you can get a preview of the stuff underground. I found like 40 coal rocks (Just havent bothered getting down that far) Anybody else notice this?
Ill try to get a screenie later.

item.title: Map Loading
item.dc:creator: @Svitkona Svitkona
item.description:
@Svitkona wrote:

Moparisthebest:

What do you mean by ‘resets’?

As in, my home kept getting reset along with my inventory, items etc which drove me to just create a new account. It’s working good now, though.
Also noticed the /home command is a bit messed up. It can sometimes teleport you above your spot, and sometimes it will teleport you inside some blocks near it. I don’t know if there’s anything you can do about that but still worth mentioning it.

Read full topic

item.title: Map Loading
item.dc:creator: @NewbieNewty Newty
item.description:
@NewbieNewty wrote:

[quote=“Fat Cookies, post:16, topic:385713”]Its nothing to do with your computer, graphics or connection, it’s the new map format that has been recently implemented into minecraft beta 1.3. For some reason if you teleport on any server (I’ve tried it) you get the “falling effect” which forces you to relog to fix.

Occasionally you land on a chunk and you then have to wait move around a bit to force the other chunks to load.[/quote]

Glad to hear thats an issue with the new server rather then my connection…

Read full topic

item.title: Map Loading
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

What do you mean by ‘resets’?

Read full topic

item.title: Map Loading
item.dc:creator: @Svitkona Svitkona
item.description:
@Svitkona wrote:

[quote=“Moparisthebest, post:15, topic:385713”][quote author=ytuio9 link=topic=481466.msg3526335#msg3526335 date=1299852763]

THIS TOTALLY SUCKS NOW! I died at home so when I do /home teleport there is a mod there that kills me and i cant see it because its not loading!

Everytime I do /home its a permakill…

fml.

Edit: Then I walk to home (takes like 3 minutes) and yet… everything is gone uhg

Yeah. I’ve complained about this two times on the official post, and nobody answered me
[/quote]

And what exactly do you think anyone can do about this?[/quote]
I’m talking about the constant resets I’ve had.

Read full topic

item.title: Map Loading
item.dc:creator: @Fat_Cookies Fat Cookies
item.description:
@Fat_Cookies wrote:

Its nothing to do with your computer, graphics or connection, it’s the new map format that has been recently implemented into minecraft beta 1.3. For some reason if you teleport on any server (I’ve tried it) you get the “falling effect” which forces you to relog to fix.

Occasionally you land on a chunk and you then have to wait move around a bit to force the other chunks to load.

Read full topic
